newsitem.title: UK: John Lewis UK dept store sales up 15.5% last week.
newsitem.headline: John Lewis UK dept store sales up 15.5% last week.

text.p: The John Lewis Partnership JLP.CN said on Friday its UK department store sales rose 15.5 percent in the week to May 10 versus the same week last year. In the 15 weeks to May 10, sales were up 9.5 percent compared with the same period a year ago.

Total sales, including the Waitrose supermarket group, were up 10.0 percent in the week to May 10 compared with a year ago and up 7.5 percent in the 15 weeks to May 10 over the same period last year. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7715
